long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the tab link in following formats with just a click: - Rich Text - Link only - Title only - Title and Link (Title - Link) - Markdown ([Title](Link)) - Excel Link (=HYPERLINK("Link", "Title")) - HTML (Title) Ability to: - Customize the options you use most often - Turn On or Off the notifications
